options.name: Martial Artist
options.description: Gain +1 Attack with Unarmed Strikes and +2 maximum Focus.

options.name: Martial Stance
options.description: You can enter a special stance as a bonus action. While in this stance, your Unarmed Strikes deal +1 damage and you gain +1 Dodge.

options.name: Ki Control
options.description: Gain +3 maximum Focus and +1 Focus Regeneration per round.

options.name: Flowing Movements
options.description: Gain +1 Coordination and +1 Dodge. You can move through enemy-occupied spaces without penalty.

options.name: Action : Stunning Strike
options.description: Make an Unarmed Strike. If it hits, the target must make a Resilience check or be Stunned until the end of your next turn.

options.name: Reaction : Deflect Missile
options.description: When you are hit by a ranged weapon attack, you can spend 1 Focus to reduce the damage by 1d10 + your Coordination modifier. If you reduce the damage to 0, you can catch the projectile.

options.name: Ki-Empowered Strikes
options.description: Your Unarmed Strikes count as magical for the purpose of overcoming damage resistance. You can spend 1 Focus to add 1d6 energy damage to your Unarmed Strike.

options.name: Action : Whirlwind Attack
options.description: You can spend 2 Focus to make an Unarmed Strike against each enemy within your reach.

options.name: Diamond Soul
options.description: Gain +1 Resistance and +1 Physical Mitigation. You can spend 1 Focus to reroll a failed saving throw.

options.name: Master Martial Artist
options.description: Gain +1 Attack and +1 Damage with Unarmed Strikes. Your critical hit threshold with Unarmed Strikes improves by 1, and you can spend 3 Focus to automatically score a critical hit with an Unarmed Strike.
